description: The B52 shot is a delicious, sweet cocktail that will have you feeling refreshed and ready for anything! This recipe includes Kahlua coffee liqueur, Grand Marnier orange liqueur, and Bailey's Irish cream.
name: B52 Shot

recipeInstructions.name: Pour Kahlua coffee liqueur into a shot glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour Kahlua coffee liqueur into a shot glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Slowly add Bailey's Irish cream Liqueur on top of the coffee and the Grand Marnier on top of Bailey's.
recipeInstructions.text: Slowly add Bailey's Irish cream Liqueur on top of the coffee and the Grand Marnier on top of Bailey's.
